sub_047_picnicnpc_01_01:
If I put the fillings in like so...and then do the
condiments like this...
sub_047_picnicnpc_01_02:
Oh, hello! Sorry, I was really thinking hard about
something just now!\c
I research sandwich recipes, you see.\c
My dream is to one day discover amazing recipes
worthy of being called Master level!\c
I can teach you recipes too, if you like!
sub_047_picnicnpc_addrecipe_01: You learned how to make some new sandwiches!
sub_047_picnicnpc_addrecipe_02:
You learned how to make some new Master
level sandwiches!
sub_047_picnicnpc_01_03:
Those recipes make mouth-wateringly good
sandwiches! Give ’em a try sometime!
sub_047_picnicnpc_01_04:
If I think up new recipes, I’ll be sure to teach
them to you!
sub_047_picnicnpc_02_01:
Oh, it’s you again! I thought up some new
recipes!
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_01:
Oh, it’s you again!\c
I’m making some new recipes, but they require
some very rare ingredients.\c
Five different ingredients, actually. They’re
called, uh, Herba...something-or-other.\c
I bet I’d come up with a recipe right away if I
could just see those herbs for myself.
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_02:
There are five of the Herba something-or-others
in all.\c
I bet I’d come up with some recipes right away if
I could just see those condiments for myself.
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_03:
H-hey! Isn’t that one of those Herba something-
or-others you have there?!\c
Ohhh! I can feel the inspiration! The recipes are
making themselves in my head right now!
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_04:
*huff* *puff*\c
Those are some wild recipes I came up with
just now!\c
Give ’em a try sometime. They’ll make top-tier
sandwiches for sure!
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_05:
Thanks to you, I was able to come up with all of
the Master-level sandwich recipes!\c
Thank you so much for helping me achieve
my dream!
sub_047_picnicnpc_03_06:
I’ll bet there are still delicious sandwich recipes
out there just waiting to be discovered!\c
If you come up with new recipes yourself, be sure
to tell other people about them!
